channel.title: Signlink help! ** please read easy fix!
channel.description:
kind of got idea why just need some info if im on the right path here.. my idea when you download the cache its zip right will u unzip the cache java does and it pop up main_cache_file right will there it unpacks all the other files into another folder called cache i think thats messing it up would it be? and if so how do i stop it from doing this? i dont have them in any folders in the zip.. when i made path on signlink like C:\.cache.zip_file_store_32\cache it gave me loaderror #20 <<
ok before i post whats going on where is says yourname i typed everything i could everyfile damn near n i get the samething! over and over finly got my cache download all the way. just im getting this now i know its a !!!!!pathway error!!!! but idk why im getting this error
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\.yourname_file_store_32\client.zip (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:214) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:144) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:115) at client.unZipFile(client.java:3382) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3355) at client.method67(client.java:3428) at client.method6(client.java:6872) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4512) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

item.title: Signlink help! ** please read easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins4866 thomashawkins4866
item.description:
@thomashawkins4866 wrote:

kind of got idea why just need some info if im on the right path here…
my idea when you download the cache its zip right will u unzip the cache java does and it pop up main_cache_file right will there it unpacks all the other files into another folder called cache i think thats messing it up would it be? and if so how do i stop it from doing this? i dont have them in any folders in the zip…
when i made path on signlink like C:.cache.zip_file_store_32\cache it gave me loaderror #20 <<

ok before i post whats going on where is says yourname i typed everything i could everyfile damn near n i get the samething! over and over finly got my cache download all the way. just im getting this now i know its a !!!pathway error!!! but idk why im getting this error

cannot find the file specified)
